^pivot // å­é˜Ÿåˆ—[1] [3] [7] [9] éƒ½åªåŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºå‡†å…ƒç´ ,ç›´æ¥è¿”å›.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------0x31 [<1>, <2>, <3>, <4>, <5>, <6>, <7>, <8>, <9>] // è·å¾—æ’å¥½é˜Ÿåˆ— ğŸ— å®ç°Java é€’å½’å®ç°12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940// swap funcprivate void swap(int[] array, int lIndex, int rIndex) { int tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// partition funcprivate int partition(int[] array, int left, int right) { // é€‰å–åŸºå‡† int pivot = array[right]; int sIndex = right; // åˆ†å‰² while(left < right) { while(array[left] <= pivot && left < right) left ++; swap(array, left, sIndex); sIndex = left; // -- while(array[right] >= pivot && left < right) right --; swap(array, sIndex, right); sIndex = right; } return sIndex;}// quick sort, recursively funcprivate void quickSort(int[] array, int left, int right) { if(left >= right) return; int parIndex = partition(array, left, right); // é€’å½’ quickSort(array, left, parIndex - 1); quickSort(array, parIndex + 1, right);}// sort interfacepublic int[] sort(int[] nums) { int[] array = Arrays.copyOf(nums, nums.length); quickSort(array, 0, array.length - 1); return array;} JavaScript é€’å½’å®ç°123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839// swap funcconst swap = (array, lIndex, rIndex) => { const tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// partition funcconst partition = (array, left, right) => { // é€‰æ‹©åŸºå‡† const pivot = array[right]; let sIndex = right; // åˆ†å‰² while(left < right) { while(array[left] <= pivot && left < right) left++; swap(array, left, sIndex); sIndex = left; // while(array[right] >= pivot && left < right) right--; swap(array, sIndex, right); sIndex = right; } return sIndex;}// quick sort, recursively funcconst quickSort = (array, left, right) => { if(left >= right) return; const parIndex = partition(array, left, right); quickSort(array, left, parIndex - 1); quickSort(array, parIndex + 1, right);}// sort interface funcconst sort = (nums) => { const array = nums.slice(); quickSort(array, 0, array.length - 1); return array;}

posts.text: ğŸ’£ åŸç†å†’æ³¡æ’åºåŸºæœ¬æ€æƒ³ï¼š å°†å¾…æ’åºé˜Ÿåˆ—åˆ†ä¸ºæœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ˆä½äºå·¦ä¾§ï¼Œåˆå§‹å€¼ä¸ºå¾…æ’åºé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼‰å’Œå·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ˆä½äºå³ä¾§ï¼Œåˆå§‹å€¼ä¸ºç©ºï¼‰ã€‚ è¿›è¡Œå†’æ³¡æ’åºçš„æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼ˆæ³¨ï¼šç®—æ³•æŠ½è±¡è¿‡ç¨‹æè¿°ï¼Œéç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼‰ã€‚1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829300 [4, 2, 3, 6, 8, 1, 5 ] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] // å°†å¾…æ’åºé˜Ÿåˆ—åˆ†ä¸º [æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] å’Œ [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------1 [4, 2, 3, 6, 1, 5, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬1æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼8å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å------------------------------------------------------------------------------------2 [4, 2, 3, 1, 5, 6, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬2æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼6å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å------------------------------------------------------------------------------------3 [4, 2, 3, 1, 5, 6, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬3æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼5å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å------------------------------------------------------------------------------------4 [ 2, 3, 1, 4, 5, 6, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬4æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼4å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å------------------------------------------------------------------------------------5 [ 2, 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬5æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼3å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 6 [ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬6æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼2å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 7 [ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8] [ æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ— ] [å·²æ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—] //ç¬¬7æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼1å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å ğŸ”ª ç®—æ³•å®ç°Javaå®ç°123456789101112131415161718// swapprivate void swap(int[] array, int lIndex, int rIndex) { int tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// sort interfacepublic int[] bubbleSort(int[] nums) { int[] array = Arrays.copyOf(nums, nums.length); // bubble sort for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) { if (array[j] > array[j + 1]) swap(array, j, j + 1); } } return array;} JavaScriptå®ç°1234567891011121314151617// swapconst swap = (array, lIndex, rIndex) => { const tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// sort interfaceconst bubbleSort = nums => { const array = nums.slice(); // bubble sort for(let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { for(let j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) if(array[j] > array[j + 1]) swap(array, j, j + 1); } return array;}
